sources.title: Laburnum Grove
sources.description: A respectable suburban householder shocks unwelcome visiting relatives by telling them that he is now a forger working for a criminal gang.

metadata.Plot: Laburnum Grove. A quiet, residential address in one of the newer north London suburbs, Nice houses. Nice people.Mr Radfern, decent, respectable citizen and householder spends his Sunday evenings in his greenhouse who would think he is a forger working for criminals.......
metadata.Writer: Anthony Kimmins, J.B. Priestley, Gordon Wellesley
metadata.Actors: Edmund Gwenn, Cedric Hardwicke, Victoria Hopper
